meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the December 13, 2023 City Council Meeting
Authorize partial settlement of the lawsuit styled Chanda Runnels, Individually and as Next Friend of D .D., a Minor, and Roy Heidelberg
agenda_items.description: Total not to exceed $140,000.00 ($65,000.00 for the settlement of the claims of Chanda Runnels and $75,000.00 for the settlement of the claims of Roy Heidelberg)

agenda_items.title: Authorize a Second Amendment to the concession contract with Air Star-Bush-LTS Marquis DAL, LLC
agenda_items.description: for food and beverage concession services at Dallas Love Field Airport, to extend the term of the contract by an additional seven years and increase pricing.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a Third Amendment to the concession contract with Host International, Inc.
agenda_items.description: for food and beverage concession services at Dallas Love Field Airport, to extend the term of the contract by an additional seven years and increase pricing.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a Fourth Amendment to the concession contract with Air Star Concessions, Ltd.
agenda_items.description: for food and beverage concessions services at Dallas Love Field Airport, to extend the term of the contract by an additional seven years and increase pricing.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a Fourth Amendment to the concession contract with Air Star-LTS/Marquis DAL, LLC
agenda_items.description: for food and beverage concessions services at Dallas Love Field Airport, to extend the term of the contract by an additional seven years and increase pricing.

agenda_items.title: Authorize amendments to four concession contracts with Hudson Dallas Love Field Concessionaires, LLC
agenda_items.description: to mitigate the increased costs of providing products and services to the traveling public and airport employees.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a five-year service price agreement for transportation for hire services
agenda_items.description: for passenger drop-off and pick-up at Dallas Love Field Airport.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance abandoning a detention area easement to Vivante Turtle Creek, LLC
agenda_items.description: containing approximately 2,019 square feet of land.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance abandoning a portion of an alley to McDonald's Real Estate Company
agenda_items.description: containing approximately 2,520 square feet of land.
